body: Please select the adventure route for submission from the dropdown. Any remaining routes you haven't ridden will be shown.
Please select your Strava Ride that corresponds with the route you are submitting. This list will show your last 5 Strava Activities.

Please provide one photo from your ride. This photo will be shared on the site with others, and used in the photo contest for a chance to win a prize! *Some newer iPhones use a HEIF format which must be converted before uploading.
